budget_notes: Total budget ¥7800, allocating ¥6300 for meals (80%), ¥1500 for miscellaneous. Higher costs in Shanghai/special dinners, lower in Beijing (rented apartment with cooking option).
booking_requirements: 人和馆 (Shanghai): Book 2 weeks in advance, ¥300 deposit required
AJIYA (Shanghai): Book 1 week in advance for preferred location
Pipa Yuan hot pot (Chongqing): No reservation needed but expect wait time
明婷饭店 (Chengdu): No reservation needed, popular lunch hours 11:30-13:00

breakfast.name: InterContinental Chongqing Raffles City - 重·林放题餐厅
breakfast.notes: Jet lag recovery - hotel buffet breakfast included with room, international options, 7:00-10:30

lunch.name: COLLIN'S Restaurant (新加坡餐厅)
lunch.notes: Light lunch in hotel after early arrival, try Singapore chili crab or laksa, convenient for jet lag

dinner.name: Pipa Yuan (枇杷园) - World's Largest Hillside Hot Pot
dinner.location: 南岸区南山街道金竹村龙井榜社, Nan'an District
dinner.notes: MUST-VISIT: Hillside hot pot with spectacular city view, 40-acre venue, colorful lights at night, employs deaf waiters (characteristic service). Guinness World Record holder. Take taxi from hotel (30min). Evening arrival recommended for night view.

days.meal_notes: First day focus: easy access, jet lag friendly, end with signature Chongqing experience

breakfast.name: 重·林放题餐厅 (Hotel buffet)
breakfast.notes: Included with room, early breakfast before 7:00am train to Bazhong

lunch.name: Train box lunch or Bazhong local restaurant
lunch.location: On train or upon arrival in Bazhong
lunch.notes: Flexible - train journey, arrive Bazhong afternoon, family time priority

dinner.name: Family home-cooked meal
dinner.notes: Chinese New Year Eve (跨年) with family, authentic home-cooked Bazhong dishes

days.meal_notes: Travel day + family reunion, minimal restaurant costs

breakfast.name: 老五酱肉包子
breakfast.notes: MUST-EAT: Most authentic Bazhong breakfast. Sauce meat + chive + scallion + Sichuan peppercorn filling, signature numb aftertaste. Arrive early (7:00-8:00am) before sold out.

lunch.name: 老七牛肉
lunch.notes: MUST-EAT before departure. Famous for 坛子牛肉 (jar beef), beef tendon super soft, soup perfect with rice. Lunch 11:30-13:00 before afternoon train.

dinner.name: Taikoo Li (太古里) area casual dining
dinner.notes: Evening arrival in Chengdu, explore Taikoo Li trendy area, many options for casual dinner

days.meal_notes: Bazhong specialty breakfast and lunch (must-try local favorites), relaxed Chengdu evening

breakfast.name: Home breakfast
breakfast.notes: Early breakfast at family home before 9:00am panda base visit

lunch.name: 明婷饭店 (Mingting Restaurant)
lunch.location: 金牛区外曹家巷26号附15号, Chengdu
lunch.notes: MUST-VISIT: Famous Sichuan restaurant, relocated in 2013. Metro Line 3 to Hongxing Bridge station. Popular 11:30-13:00, expect wait. Try classic Sichuan dishes. Alternative options: 饕林, 牛丞丞和牛 (research needed for addresses).

dinner.name: Shanghai Bund area casual dining
dinner.notes: Evening arrival Shanghai (17:20), check-in hotel, light dinner before exploring Bund night view

days.meal_notes: Chengdu authentic Sichuan lunch (highlight), travel day with Shanghai arrival

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast or local Shanghai breakfast
breakfast.notes: Try Shanghai breakfast classics: 小笼包 (xiaolongbao), 生煎包 (shengjianbao), 豆浆油条

lunch.name: Bund/People's Square area restaurant
lunch.notes: Exploring city (人民广场, 外滩, possibly 浦东美术馆), choose restaurant along route

dinner.name: INFJ-friendly unique cafe or trendy restaurant
dinner.notes: Focus on INFJ preferences: indie bookstore cafe (English books), unique aesthetic, cute 潮玩 nearby. Consider Tianzifang or French Concession areas.

days.meal_notes: Shanghai exploration day, balance authentic breakfast with trendy INFJ-friendly dinner

breakfast.name: Hotel or nearby quick breakfast
breakfast.notes: Early departure for Shanghai Disneyland, grab-and-go breakfast

lunch.name: Shanghai Disneyland
lunch.notes: Full day at Disneyland, lunch inside park. Budget for theme park pricing.

dinner.name: Shanghai Disneyland or return to city
dinner.notes: Depends on park closing time and energy level. Option to return to hotel area for dinner.

days.meal_notes: Full Disneyland day, higher costs expected for theme park dining

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast or local breakfast
breakfast.notes: Relaxed breakfast before Michelin dining day

lunch.name: 人和馆·上海菜 (Renheguan)
lunch.location: 肇嘉浜路407号 (Jiashanlu Metro L9/12) or 静安寺店
lunch.notes: MUST-VISIT: Michelin 1-star (2025), BOOK 2 WEEKS IN ADVANCE, ¥300 deposit, limited dining time. Famous for 蟹粉捞饭 (crab roe rice), 金牌红烧肉, 松鼠桂鱼. Avg ¥176-200/person. Peak hours wait 2+ hours.

dinner.name: AJIYA炭火烤肉 (AJIYA Japanese BBQ)
dinner.location: Multiple locations: 静安店, 淮海中路店, or Plus乐坊店
dinner.notes: MUST-VISIT: Premium Japanese BBQ from Tokyo 'HORUMON倶乐部味藏'. Famous for 上等牛小排 (premium beef short rib), 特等厚切牛舌. Book 1 week advance. High-end dinner experience.

days.meal_notes: HIGHLIGHT DAY: Double Michelin/high-end experience (人和馆 lunch + AJIYA dinner). Budget accordingly.

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast or airport
breakfast.notes: Early flight 9:05am, breakfast before departure

lunch.name: Beijing Daxing Airport or near hotel
lunch.notes: Arrive Beijing 11:25am, lunch after arrival before afternoon registration

dinner.name: Zhongguancun area quick dinner
dinner.notes: Quick dinner before evening 舞剧《只此青绿》performance. Light meal recommended.

lunch.notes: Building comfort zone - try 渝是乎 (¥40/person, 酸菜鱼 and 冒菜) or campus restaurants. Campus tour day.

dinner.name: 巴依老爷新疆美食 or 南京大牌档
dinner.location: Tsinghua East Gate or 中关村广场
dinner.notes: Options: 巴依老爷 (¥80, Xinjiang BBQ, Tsinghua East Gate) or 南京大牌档 (¥60, Nanjing dishes with 评弹 performance)

breakfast.name: INFJ-friendly cafe breakfast
breakfast.notes: If visiting 798: Try VOYAGE COFFEE (¥40/person, 8:30-19:00) or Yang Coffee (inside gallery). English indie bookstores + cute cafes.

lunch.name: 798 Art District restaurant
lunch.notes: 798 area: 大千食 (¥108/person, 11:00-21:30) or Yi House (high-end Bauhaus building). Unique aesthetic dining.

dinner.name: Trendy Beijing restaurant
dinner.notes: Shopping + trendy spots day. Consider 大树餐厅 (合生汇, ¥面包咖喱鸡 signature) or 墨纪Moji墨西哥餐厅 (三里屯太古里).

days.meal_notes: INFJ-friendly day: 798 art + trendy cafes/bookstores + cute shops, higher budget for unique experiences

highlights: Pipa Yuan hillside hot pot (world's largest)
Mix of special dinners and practical meals

must_visit_completed: ✓ Chongqing hillside hot pot with city view - Pipa Yuan (world's largest, Guinness Record)
recommendations: Book 人和馆 at least 2 weeks in advance (¥300 deposit, limited dining time)
Book AJIYA 1 week in advance for preferred location (静安店 or 淮海中路店 recommended)
Pipa Yuan hot pot: Visit evening for spectacular night view with colorful lights (taxi 30min from Raffles City)
老五酱肉包子: Arrive early 7:00-8:00am, popular item sells out quickly
老七牛肉: Perfect farewell lunch before Bazhong departure, try 坛子牛肉
明婷饭店: Peak lunch hours 11:30-13:00, expect wait time, authentic 苍蝇馆子 experience
Shanghai Day 5-7: Balance high-end dining (人和馆, AJIYA) with INFJ-friendly indie cafes
Beijing solo days (Wed/Thu): Embrace home cooking to save budget (¥67-85/day vs ¥150-310 couple days)
Beijing comfort zone: Invest time Days 9-10 discovering favorite spots around Tsinghua for long-term
798 Art District: Visit Day 14 for INFJ experience (VOYAGE COFFEE, Yang Coffee, 大千食, English bookstores)
Budget strategy: High-end experiences in Shanghai (Days 5-7), budget-conscious in Beijing with apartment cooking
Girlfriend school days: Use for solo budget meals, save for quality couple time on free days
Final week: Revisit discovered favorites, build routines for girlfriend's comfort after departure
booking_checklist: [ ] Week of Feb 1: Book 人和馆 for Feb 21 (2 weeks advance, ¥300 deposit)
[ ] Week of Feb 8: Book AJIYA for Feb 21 evening (1 week advance)
[ ] Research 饕林 and 牛丞丞和牛 specific addresses in Chengdu (alternatives to 明婷饭店)
[ ] Optional: Pre-book 大树餐厅 or trendy restaurants for Beijing Day 14 (798 area)
[ ] Download Meituan/Dianping for food delivery on Beijing solo days
infj_preferences_addressed: Shanghai Day 5: Indie bookstores (English), unique cafes, cute 潮玩 stores (Tianzifang/French Concession)
Shanghai Day 7: High-quality Michelin experience (人和馆) + premium AJIYA dinner
Beijing Day 14: 798 Art District (galleries + VOYAGE/Yang Coffee + English bookstores)
Beijing comfort zone: Tsinghua area familiar restaurants, low-stress repeated visits
Quality over quantity: Fewer high-end meals rather than many average meals
Unique experiences: Pipa Yuan (world's largest hot pot), 明婷饭店 (authentic 苍蝇馆子), Michelin dining

family_home_meals.note: Bazhong and Chengdu family home stays

apartment_cooking.note: Beijing solo days and home breakfasts

couple_days.strategy: Mix of restaurants and apartment meals, special experiences

solo_days.strategy: Home cooking majority, campus cafeterias, budget focus

cost_saving_strategies: Beijing apartment cooking saves ¥80-100/day on solo days (5 solo days = ¥400-500 saved)
Family home stays (Bazhong/Chengdu): 5 free meals = ¥400-500 saved
Hotel breakfast included: Chongqing Days 1-2 saves ¥256
Strategic high-end meals: Concentrate in Shanghai (4 days) rather than spread across trip
Delivery apps (Meituan) for solo dinners: ¥20-30 vs ¥50-70 restaurant
sources: Bazhong restaurants: Multiple local sources for 老五酱肉包子 and 老七牛肉
